summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to land use and zoning, amending Plat 58E, page 145, Plat 59W, page 146, Plat 65E, page 158, and Plat 66W, page 159 of the Official Land Use Map, Seattle Municipal Code (SMC) Chapter 23.32, to rezone properties near the proposed Edmunds light rail station (these properties are generally located along Martin Luther King Jr. Way South from Sears Drive South to South Americus Street) and to designate boundaries for the Station Area Overlay District near the proposed Edmunds light rail station; amending SMC Section 23.47.040 to designate principal pedestrian streets; and amending SMC Section 23.70.004 to delete Exhibit 1D.
